html:
Recommendation Sheet

{% if doc.workflow_state != "Prepared" %} {% set currency_symbol = frappe.db.get_value("Currency",doc.currency,'symbol') %} {% set a = namespace(initial_amount=0, initial_amount_tax=0) %} {% set b = namespace(budget_name='', budget_amount=0, gst_rate=0, budget_total=0, purchase_total=0, budget_item='',supplier_qut_amt=[], budget_sum = 0) %} {% set displayed_groups = [] %} {% set displayed_items = [] %} {% set displayed_amt = [] %} {% set supplier_qut_amt_base = frappe.db.get_all("Supplier Quotation", filters={"custom_request_for_quotation": doc.custom_request_for_quotation}, fields=["name", "grand_total"] ) %} {% set low = namespace(lowest_total=None, is_lowest=True) %} {% set displayed_items = [] %} {% for lowest in supplier_qut_amt_base %} {% if doc.name != lowest.name %} {% set _ = displayed_items.append(lowest.grand_total) %} {% if low.lowest_total is none or lowest.grand_total < low.lowest_total %} {% set low.lowest_total = lowest.grand_total %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% for item in doc.items %} {% set b.gst_rate = (frappe.db.get_value("Item Tax Template", item.item_tax_template, "gst_rate") or 0) %} {% endfor %} {% set num = 0 %} {% for item in doc.taxes %} {% if item.included_in_print_rate == 1 %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}

{{ doc.company }}
Client {{ frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project,"customer") or ''}}
Project {{ frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project,"project_name") }}
TITLE {{ doc.custom_title or ' ' }}
Project No. {{ doc.project }} REVISION NO 0
DOCUMENT NO {{ doc.name }} DATE {{ doc.get_formatted('transaction_date') }}
Sr.No Details/Query Answers Remarks
a Recommended Vendor {% set rfq_doc = frappe.get_doc("Request for Quotation", doc.custom_request_for_quotation) %} {% for supplier in rfq_doc.suppliers %} {{ supplier.supplier_name }}, {% endfor %} {{ doc.supplier_name }}
b Initial Offer Amount (Recommended Vendor) Basic Cost {% for item in doc.items %} {% set a.initial_amount = a.initial_amount + (item.custom_supplier_rate * item.qty ) %} {% endfor %} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(a.initial_amount or 0, currency=currency_symbol) }}
Tax {% for item in doc.items %} {% set a.initial_amount_tax = a.initial_amount_tax + (frappe.db.get_value("Item Tax Template", item.item_tax_template, "gst_rate") or 0) * item.custom_supplier_rate/100 %} {% endfor %} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(a.initial_amount_tax, currency=currency_symbol) }}
Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(a.initial_amount + a.initial_amount_tax, currency=currency_symbol) }}
c Is recommended Vendor amount the lowest compared to others? Yes / No {% set recommended_vendor_total = doc.grand_total or 0 %} {% if low.lowest_total and recommended_vendor_total > 0 %} {{ "Yes" if recommended_vendor_total <= low.lowest_total else "No" }} {% else %} No {% endif %}
If No, reason for higher quotation Refer Remarks.
d Budget amount Remaining Budget {% set b.budget_name = frappe.db.get_value("Project Budget", {'company': doc.company, 'project': doc.project, 'department': doc.custom_department}, 'name') %} {% for item in doc.items %} {% set budget_items = frappe.db.get_all("Budget Items", filters={'parent': b.budget_name}, fields=['*']) %} {% for budget_item in budget_items %} {% if budget_item.apply_budget_on == "Item Group" and item.item_group == budget_item.item and budget_item.item not in displayed_groups %} {% set b.budget_item = b.budget_item + (', ' if b.budget_item else '') + budget_item.current_budget|string %} {% set b.budget_sum = b.budget_sum + budget_item.current_budget|float %} {% set _ = displayed_groups.append(budget_item.item) %} {% elif budget_item.apply_budget_on == "Item" and item.item_code == budget_item.item and budget_item.item not in displayed_items %} {% set b.budget_item = b.budget_item + (', ' if b.budget_item else '') + budget_item.current_budget|string %} {% set b.budget_sum = b.budget_sum + budget_item.current_budget|float %} {% set _ = displayed_items.append(budget_item.item) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money( b.budget_sum, currency=currency_symbol) }}
e Purchase order value Basic Cost {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total or 0 , currency=currency_symbol) }}
Tax {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.taxes_and_charges_added or 0 , currency=currency_symbol) }}
Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.grand_total or 0, currency=currency_symbol) }}
f Is Actual cost under the budget Yes/ No {% if doc.total < b.budget_sum|float %} Yes {% else %} No {% endif %}
If No, Refer Remarks.
g Additional Cost
{{ num + 1 }} {{ item.description or ' ' }} Inclusive
h Is scope of supply in accordance with PO/WO by client? Please Refer Remarks, If Scope Of Supply Is Not In Accordance With PO/Wo By Client.
j Payment Terms {{ doc.custom_payment_terms or '' }}
k Delivery Period {{ doc.custom_delivery_terms or '' }}
1 Is the delivery period accordance to the execution schedule ? Please Refer Remarks, If the delivery Period Is not Accordance To The Executation Schedule.
Submitted By
Reviwed By
Approved By
Sign
{% set submit_name = frappe.db.get_value("Comment", {"comment_type": "Workflow", "reference_name": doc.name, "content": "Submitted"}, "comment_email") %} {{ frappe.db.get_value("User",submit_name,"full_name") }}
{% set review_name = frappe.db.get_value("Comment", {"comment_type": "Workflow", "reference_name": doc.name, "content": "Reviewed"}, "comment_email") %} {{ frappe.db.get_value("User",review_name,"full_name") }}
{% set approve_name = frappe.db.get_value("Comment", {"comment_type": "Workflow", "reference_name": doc.name, "content": "Approved"}, "comment_email") %} {{ frappe.db.get_value("User",approve_name,"full_name") }}
{% endif %}
